article: My best friend is one of my classmates. We have the  _  hobby. We both enjoy music. I am good  _  English, but she isn't. I asked, "What are you doing?" "Nothing," she answered shyly. I didn't know  _  she closed her book. "I just want to  _  you," I said. "Please don't laugh at me.
